vacations.title: Down Under Getaway
vacations.description: Spend 10 days touring the highlights of Australia, including Sydney, Uluru, and the Great Barrier Reef.

vacations.title: Bolivian Farm Working Holiday
vacations.description: Live with a Bolivian family and work on their farm for five days.

vacations.title: Egyptian History Getaway
vacations.description: Experience the wonders of ancient Egypt with this two week tour.

vacations.title: Hike Through Patagonia
vacations.description: Begin your getaway in Bariloche and hike your way South, ending up in Torres del Paine National Park.

vacations.title: Getaway To Paradise
vacations.description: Rest and relaxation in paradise! In the Maldives you can swim, snorkel, dive, fish, and a host of other activities to recharge your body and mind.

vacations.title: Himalaya Trek
vacations.description: Push yourself to your limit as you hike through the Himalayas to base camp of Mt. Everest.

vacations.title: Paradise Bay
vacations.description: Destination of your dreams, this paradise bay was made for the living with amenities that only deities can dream of.

vacations.title: Paris
vacations.description: Bonjour, salut et bienvenue mon Ami. Welcome to the city of love where there is no shortage of love for the random stranger.

vacations.title: Rwanda
vacations.description: Allow yourself to rediscover the reminiscence that transcends earth. There is an abundance of wildlife which would astound your senses.

vacations.title: Santorini
vacations.description: The majestic atmosphere will take your breath away. You are never going to feel such transcendance like this again.

vacations.title: Miami
vacations.description: Destination of your dreams, this paradise bay was made for the living with amenities that only deities can dream of.

vacations.title: Taj Mahal
vacations.description: This is no ordinary declaration of love, it is the biggest gift that a husband can give to his wife. The love is ever present in the building built with the utmost dedication.
